ARABIC: إِنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your wealth and children are a trial. But with Allah there is an immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your wealth and children are surely meant as trial for you: But with God is the great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Your possessions and your offspring are nothing but a trial for you. And there awaits a great reward for you with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your property and children are a trial for you, but the reward (which one may receive from God) is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Your wealth and your children are just a test; and with Allah is a tremendous reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Your wealth and your children are only a Fitnah, whereas Allah! With Him is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Your possessions and your children are only a trial, and Allah it is with Whom is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Your wealth and your children are only a trial; and with God is a mighty wage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Your wealth and your children are only a temptation, whereas Allah! with Him is an immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your wealth and your children are only a trial; God's reward is great:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Your riches and your children are but a temptation; and Allah! with Him is a mighty hire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Rather, your possessions, and children are a test, and Allah—with Him is a great reward!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Your riches and your children may be but a trial: but in the Presence of Allah, is the highest, Reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Your wealth and your children are only a trial, whereas Allah! With Him is a great reward (Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your wealth and children are but a trial, and with Allah is a mighty wage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your possessions and your children are a test, but with God is a splendid reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [64:15]   Your possessions and your children are only a trial, for you, distracting [you] from the concerns of the Hereafter, and God — with Him is a great reward, so do not forfeit it by preoccupying yourselves with possessions and children.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 672 (Your wealth and your children) who are in Mecca (are only a temptation) they are a calamity for you if they prevent you from migrating and taking part in jihad, (whereas Allah! with Him is an immense reward) for he who migrates and takes part in jihad in the way of Allah and is, further, not distracted by his wealth and children from migrating and taking part in jihad.
